headline.main: 200 GREEK SHIPS NOW AIDING ALLIES; Stavros Theofanidies, Minister of Marine of Government in Exile, Gives Figures HERE ON SERVICING JOB He Says Half of the Pre-War Merchant Fleet Was Lost to Axis Sea Raiders

lead_paragraph: The Greek maritime contribution to the Allied cause is now 200 deep-sea vessels of 1,000,000 tons, according to Stavros Theofanidies, Minister of Mercantile Marine of the Greek Government in exile, who arrived here yesterday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: GOVERNMENTS IN EXILE AND NATIONAL COMMITTEES
